Addressing dam building-associate disease risk can benefit communities across Africa. ::: {.centered-links} More Information Risk assessment software ::: [Image: Diama Dam (CC-BY-NC): [Par Ji-Elle](https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=1621736)]{style="font-size:.7rem; color:#ae5b5b;"} ::: ::: {.banner-image} ![](images/BarrageDiama.jpg) ::: ::: ::: ::: {.banner .banner-1} ::: {.banner-content} ::: {.banner-image} ![](images/FISH.png) ::: ::: {.banner-text} ## Integrated Rice-Fish Farming Rice is a vital staple to feed Africa's growing population, however, rice farming exposes farmers to schistosomiasis.
